title: Crazy Desires Of A Murderer, I Vizi Morbosi Di Una Governante 1977 Corrado Gaipa, Roberto Zattini, Isabelle Marchall, Annie Carrol Edel, Patrizia Gori + Filippo Walter Ratti

sources.title: Crazy Desires Of A Murderer I Vizi Morbosi Di Una Governante 1977 Corrado Gaipa
sources.description: Perhaps something gets lost in the translation here but the movie seems to be about some drug smugglers who use the wrong young girl as a mule. Oddly they are only dealing with about 12 ounces of whatever drug they are importing. Still there is a spooky castle, a deranged relation, an old senile father and untrustworthy staff.
